Subject: Re: Propositions


> :::Ratchet/Bluestreak/Andromeda/The Skyscorchers/Sharpedge:::
>
> ::Ratchet, Bluestreak and Andromeda walk up to the computer baords.  They
> install them::
> Bluestreak: Cant we make this quick?  I mean you KNOW that Spears was
fakin
> it awhile ago right?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
>
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::The Skyscorchers walk into Windrazor's room::
> Windrazor: Eagle Eye, you were a good warrior and a friend to boot.  Its
sad
> to see(sob) another old friend die.  You were a quiet bot, always litsened
to
> what people were telling you.  You will be missed.
> Terradive: That was beautiful man!
> Windrazor: What about you Vulois?  Any thing meaningful?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
>
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Sharpedge smiled.  Apart from being very triggerhappy, he was also a
> pyromaniac::
> Sharpedge: Burn!
>
>
